name: ChronoFormer
description:
Controls:

  •   Move: S/F
  •   Jump: E
  •   Aim: Mouse
  •   Throw bomb: Left click
  •   Menu: Escape

Rules:

  Reach the flag at the end of the levels. But be wary of these evil lasers. Move, hide or throw  your bomb during your turn to survive.

Credits:

This game was made in one week for the Weekly Game Jam 193 by Ulquiro. The theme of the jam was Turn based platformer.

Everything in the game was made during the jam except these following assets.

  • The music is from the ost of a cancelled  project.  Click here to listen on bandcamp.
  •   Font: Zector on dafont.com
  •   Smoke texture on nicepng.com

Special thanks:

  •   Oliverkid for level design ideas.
  •   You for playing the game and eventually giving  me feedback.
